relations.evidence: virus's distinctive furin cleavage site absent in closely related sarbecoviruses

relations.evidence: affirmed the lab leak as the most probable origin

relations.evidence: WIV took its public database of over 22,000 viral samples offline

relations.evidence: reemergence of the H1N1 influenza A virus in 1977... attributed to an accidental release
